about_the_game:
- Full Hentai -

Say goodbye to static visuals. This game immerses you in a fully 3D world where you can explore, interact, and build relationships with the girls. Enjoy the experience on both PC and VR.


Unleash Your Inner Otaku

Prepare to embark on a thrilling adventure through a vibrant anime world filled with romance, intrigue, and uncensored passion. Discover a captivating open-world dating simulator where you'll encounter 17 stunning women, each with their own unique personality and desires.


A World of Endless Possibilities

Explore the breathtaking serene countryside village from Japan and the vibrant campus of a girls' university. Interact with a diverse cast of characters, uncover hidden secrets, and complete challenging missions to deepen your bonds with your potential love interests.


Customize Your Fantasy

As you unlock intimate moments with each girl, experience the thrill of uncensored encounters that will leave you breathless. But that's not all! Once you've conquered the hearts of all 17 women, the true power of customization begins. Create and personalize your own intimate scenes, down to the smallest detail, ensuring that your fantasy becomes a reality.


KEY HIGHLIGHTS:

  • Hentai Anime Style: Every graphic, character, and setting immerses you completely in the breathtaking world of anime.

  • 17 Beautiful Women: All legal age of majority! Nudity and animations available for all girls!

  • Female and Male Genitals: For both characters, girls and men, everything is uncensored. No mosaics on the genitals!

  • Graphics: Stunning visuals and vibrant wildlife, enhancing the immersive anime atmosphere.

  • Open World Exploration: Explore a vast and immersive world filled with stunning landscapes, vibrant cities, and charming countryside villages.

  • Intense Romance: Experience the thrill of uncensored romance and intimacy as you deepen your bonds with your chosen love interests.

  • Customizable Experiences: Create and personalize your own intimate scenes, ensuring that your fantasy becomes a reality.

  • Engaging Gameplay: Solve challenging missions, uncover hidden secrets, and interact with a diverse cast of characters.


** NOT A VISUAL NOVEL **

Prepare for a journey that combines love, hentai-inspired adventures, and a heart-pounding romance story. Dive into a world of uncensored experiences where every girl holds a secret, and only you can unlock the full potential of their intimacy.

  • Hentai Secrets is a fully interactive game.

  • Hentai Secrets is not just a video or pre rendered images. It is fully interactable.

  • A VR headset is not required, but it significantly enhances the experience.

* With a VR headset, the experience is truly phenomenal!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back, of several women characters and one male character, all of legal age of majority. 

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model. The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.


There is nothing forced in the game. All situations and models were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.


In Hentai Secrets you will be able to talk to the characters, engave in conversations, seduce them and have a private session in a room.


It is possible to see in detail the woman's facial expressions and erogenous zones, including her genitalia. 
There is a male in the scene as well, and you also can see his genitalia in detail.

You must be legal age of majority or over to play Hentai Secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: OpenXR Devices
  • Additional Notes: You DO NOT need a VR Headset to play this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: OpenXR Devices
  • Additional Notes: You DO NOT need a VR Headset to play this game.
